celltreenode.h
1 #ifndef CELLTREENODE_H
2 #define CELLTREENODE_H
3 
4 #include "export.h"
5 #include "scalar.h"
6 #include "index.h"
7 //#include "shm.h"
8 
9 namespace vistle {
10 
11 template<size_t IndexSize, int NumDimensions>
12 struct CelltreeNode;
13 
14 template<int NumDimensions>
15 struct CelltreeNode<8, NumDimensions> {
16  union {
17  struct {
18  Scalar Lmax, Rmin; //< for inner nodes: max of left subvolume, min of right subvolume
19  };
20  struct {
21  Index start, size; //< for leaf nodes: index into cell array
22  };
23  };
24 
25  Index dim: NumDimensions==1 ? 1 : 2; //< split dimension, or NumDimensions for leaf nodes
26  Index child: sizeof(Index)*8-(NumDimensions==1 ? 1 : 2); //< index of first child for inner nodes
27 
28  CelltreeNode(Index start=0, Index size=0) // leaf node
29  : start(start)
30  , size(size)
31  , dim(NumDimensions)
32  , child(0)
33  {}
34 
35  CelltreeNode(int dim, Scalar Lmax, Scalar Rmin, Index children) // inner node
36  : Lmax(Lmax)
37  , Rmin(Rmin)
38  , dim(dim)
39  , child(children)
40  {}
41 
42  bool isLeaf() const { return dim == NumDimensions; }
43  Index left() const { return child; }
44  Index right() const { return child+1; }
45 
46  ARCHIVE_ACCESS
47  template<class Archive>
48  void serialize(Archive &ar) {}
49 };
50 
51 template<int NumDimensions>
52 struct CelltreeNode<4, NumDimensions> {
53  union {
54  struct {
55  Scalar Lmax, Rmin; //< for inner nodes: max of left subvolume, min of right subvolume
56  };
57  struct {
58  Index start, size; //< for leaf nodes: index into cell array
59  };
60  };
61 
62  Index dim; //< split dimension, or NumDimensions for leaf nodes
63  Index child; //< index of first child for inner nodes
64 
65  CelltreeNode(Index start=0, Index size=0) // leaf node
66  : start(start)
67  , size(size)
68  , dim(NumDimensions)
69  , child(0)
70  {}
71 
72  CelltreeNode(int dim, Scalar Lmax, Scalar Rmin, Index children) // inner node
73  : Lmax(Lmax)
74  , Rmin(Rmin)
75  , dim(dim)
76  , child(children)
77  {}
78 
79  bool isLeaf() const { return dim == NumDimensions; }
80  Index left() const { return child; }
81  Index right() const { return child+1; }
82 
83  ARCHIVE_ACCESS
84  template<class Archive>
85  void serialize(Archive &ar) {}
86 };
87 
88 } // namespace vistle
89 
90 #endif
